root.name: Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei Vulcan Horses
root.description: OverviewMetal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei Vulcan Horses is an action game developed and published by Takara Tomy for the PSP platform. Metal Fight Beyblade Portable: Chouzetsu Tensei Vulcan Horses was only released in Japan.
